Title: Anomalisa
Overview: An inspirational speaker becomes reinvigorated after meeting a lively woman who shakes up his mundane existence.
Tagline: Welcome to the Kaufman surreal-neorealism tale in a dull world of sameness.
Cast: David Thewlis, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Tom Noonan
